About this item

  • SHARP 24" LCD smart television: Stunning HD clarity and vibrant colours, for all your favourite content. The TV’s classic black finish, with remote control included, complements any room
  • Plenty of ports: With 2 x HDMI, SCART, USB, Component, Composite and Digital Optical Audio ports. It can be used on a table top/stand/TV unit or wall mounted
  • Live TV or catch up: Enjoy Netflix, YouTube, and BBC iPlayer apps. Screen share with your smart device using Miracast. Freeview Play is live and on demand, to stay on top of the last 7 days’ viewing
  • High definition viewing with Harmon Kardon sound and Dolby Digital audio technology: Ensures this Smart TV offers a fully immersive experience. With built in Wi-Fi for ultra connectivity
  • A slim, compact TV with a multitude of features: Such as DTS TruSurround, Freeview HD and PVR recording. Ideal for use in the kitchen, bedroom, lounge, play room or student accommodation
